entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 18 February 2023
